name: Tartan Dreamcatcher
description:
This one is a new personal favourite! Its wrap around web and unsymmetrical shape looks modern but the tartan, large feathers and little bit of velvet ribbon keeps things traditional! 

Measures 13cm wide by 28cm long.

2.60 UK postage and packaging for this item!

Order by Wednesday 18th December for Christmas delivery!

Our dreamcatchers are made by hand from unwanted jewellery, bits & bobs and haberdashery. All materials used are one of a kind meaning each dreamcatcher is unique!

Dreamcatchers are traditionally used to catch bad dreams and encourage good ones! Hang yours above your bed so it can work its magic or hand it on the wall for decoration.

name: Buttons and Beads Dreamcatcher
description:
This dreamcatcher has lost going on! A modern style with a navy velvet frame and a mixture of pastel coloured ribbons, lace and feathers. There are plenty of beads, buttons and trinkets in all colours that add a nice bit of sparkle!

Measures 12cm wide by 27cm long.

2.60 UK postage and packaging for this item!

Order by Wednesday 18th December for Christmas delivery!

Our dreamcatchers are made by hand from unwanted jewellery, bits & bobs and haberdashery. All materials used are one of a kind meaning each dreamcatcher is unique!

Dreamcatchers are traditionally used to catch bad dreams and encourage good ones! Hang yours above your bed so it can work its magic or hand it on the wall for decoration.

name: Christmas Dreamcatcher
description:
A simple traditionally shaped dreamcatcher with a Christmas twist! The frame is wooden with a red ribbon trim along the outside and a beaded web in the centre. White feathers, a star and a sparkly little bauble hang from the hoop making this a great Christmas decoration!  
Measures 13cm wide by 28cm long.

2.60 UK postage and packaging for this item!

Order by Wednesday 18th December for Christmas delivery!

name: Pearl Dreamcatcher
description:
Part of a new collection using twig hoops! They just make everything look so earthy and natural and we love it! 
This one is super girly with a two toned intricate web and soft strips of lace, ribbon and yarn. The colours are pretty and to finish things off there's a string of pearly beads and a light floaty feather.

Measures 10cm wide by 21cm long.

£1.50 UK postage and packaging for this item!

name: Handmade Greetings Cards
description:
A6 size greetings cards featuring 3 designs of original artwork, comes with a brown envelope.

Cards are blank inside so you can use them for anything! From Thank You notes to invitations.

You can purchase just one card for £2.50 or if you'd like one of each design get 3 for only £6! Just pop in the code '3CARDS' at the checkout to receive the discount.

Free postage to UK with this item!

Our prints and cards are created using an ink-jet colour printer and are copied onto 220gsm high quality card.

name: Framed Prints
description:
These prints of original artwork are in a rustic style wooden frame, ready to hang on the wall or stand as decoration. 

There are 3 images to choose from and the frame measures 8" tall x 6" wide. Image size is 5.5" tall x 3.5" wide. Product Contains Glass!

You can purchase one piece for £12 or if you'd like one of each design, 3 for £30. Just enter the code 'ARTWORK' at the checkout to receive the discount.

UK Postage for this item is £3.

Our prints and cards are created using an ink-jet colour printer and are copied onto 220gsm high quality card.

description:

Free postage to everywhere in the UK with this item!

Our Scrunchies are involved in 3 special offers at the moment:

Get any 2 scrunchies and a Pocket Mirror for only £5 including p&p!
enter the code 'DEAL1' at the checkout to get the discount.

name: Pocket Mirror
description:
Our pocket mirrors are designed by us and feature little bits of art printed onto a 58mm wide surface with mirror glass on the opposite side. 
Circular in shape with no sharp points or edges!

They are super handy to have and are great as part of a gift. (Perfect for Christmas stocking fillers!)

Order by Wednesday 18th December for Christmas delivery!

Four options are available:

Hippie Bunny
The Chief Elephant
Unicorn wearing a flower crown
Cluster of Turquoise tumbled stone crystals.

Free UK Postage on this item!

This product is part of our £12 Christmas Goodie Bag Deal!

Add this to your cart along with any Gift size Dreamcatcher, Hat and 2 Scrunchies.
